thread.title: Kendrick Lamar Shares New Song “The Heart Part 4”
thread.title_full: Kendrick Lamar Shares New Song “The Heart Part 4”

author: Jake Boyer
title: Kendrick Lamar Shares New Song “The Heart Part 4”
text:
Yesterday, Kendrick Lamar got up to some very suspicious activity on Instagram, removing all of his previous posts and replacing it with an image featuring the Roman numeral for ‘four.’ Understandably, people went wild. Now, Kendrick has made good on the rumor mill and dropped a brand new song titled “The Heart Part 4.” Listen to it below:


The track confirms wide-spread speculation that Kendrick is coming very close to dropping his fourth album. He seems to admit this much himself; at the end of the track one can hear him say “Y’all got ’til April 7 to get y’all shit together,” teasing what very well could be a release date to the proper follow-up to 2015’s To Pimp a Butterfly . Stay tuned to see what happens next.
In other music news, Gorillaz have announced their new album Humanz and have shared a new music video. Watch it right here .
